text:
OH OUCH. First Q from Starmer is a DOOZIE. 

“The Daily Telegraph this morning is reporting that the PM has now decided to take direct control of the government’s response to the coronavirus. So the obvious question for the PM is; who’s been in direct control up till now?” #PMQs
